content.text:
[@myf](@GLH9VPzvvU2KcnnUu2n5oxOqaTUtzw+Rk6fd/Kb9Si0=.ed25519)

I got a message from [@cryptix](@p13zSAiOpguI9nsawkGijsnMfWmFd5rlUNpzekEE+vI=.ed25519) who pointed out that `dleyna-renderer-service` was dying before everything else, so I've:

- switched back to xorg
- removed the `dleyna-renderer` package

Any chance you're on Wayland or have `dleyna-renderer` installed? Unfortunately I had to `pacman -R dleyna-renderer gnome-photos`, but I haven't had any crashes yet. Not sure which change fixed it, but that's progress.
